entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
